alert.note: Alert for Logan; McLean; Tazewell (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:59AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LOGAN...EASTERN TAZEWELL AND SOUTHWESTERN MCLEAN COUNTIES... At 758 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hopedale, or 15 miles southeast of Pekin, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stanford, Armington, Atlanta and McLean. This includes the following highways... Interstate 155 between mile markers 8 and 31. Interstate 55 between mile markers 132 and 159. Interstate 74 between mile markers 102 and 109, and between mile markers 131 and 136. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm has a history of producing wind damage. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Lincoln.
